wikipedia_page.main: Greg John Taylor (born 5 November 1997) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays for Celtic and the Scotland national team. He is a defensive and midfield utility player primarily deployed at left-back.

response: * Greg Taylor (youth career Rangers, senior career Celtic)
